mapper.select: select tr.id, reply_content, diary_id, tr.member_id, tm.member_name, tr.created_datetime, tr.updated_datetime, tm.social_img_url, vfmf.file_path from tbl_member tm join tbl_reply tr on tm.id = tr.member_id and tr.reply_status = 'active' left join view_file_member_file vfmf on vfmf.member_id = tm.id and tm.member_status = 'active' where diary_id = #{postId} order by tr.id desc limit #{criteria.count} offset #{criteria.offset}
select count(id) from tbl_reply where diary_id =#{postId} and reply_status = 'active'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply (reply_content, diary_id, member_id) values (#{replyContent}, #{postId},#{memberId})
